tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_title VARCHAR(255),
    patent_description TEXT,
    patent_inventor VARCHAR(100),
    filing_date DATE,
    approval_date DATE,
    grant_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patent_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    patent_owner VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    filing_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_patent_owner FOREIGN KEY (patent_owner) REFERENCES owners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE owners (
    owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    owner_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    owner_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patent (
    patent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    inventor VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    filing_date DATE,
    patent_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_title VARCHAR(255),
    patent_description TEXT,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(100),
    filing_date DATE,
    filing_country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_authors (
    author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(100),
    author_email VARCHAR(255),
    author_affiliation VARCHAR(255),
    patent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(patent_id) REFERENCES patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_comment TEXT,
    review_date DATE,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(100),
    patent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(patent_id) REFERENCES patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_access_controls (
    access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    access_level VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    patent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(patent_id) REFERENCES patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(255),
    applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
    filing_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    access_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_inventors (
    inventor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_id INT,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(255),
    inventor_email VARCHAR(255),
    inventor_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patent_owners (
    owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_id INT,
    owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    owner_address TEXT,
    owner_contact VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_assignees (
    assignee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_id INT,
    assignee_name VARCHAR(255),
    assignee_type VARCHAR(50),
    assignee_contact VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE access_controls (
    access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    patent_id INT,
    access_level VARCHAR(50),
    access_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
